name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Charles Joseph LUCARELLI, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Charles Joseph LUCARELLI, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of July, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Whether the Superior Court erred in applying the doctrine of Forfeiture of the Right to Counsel?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
929 A.2d 642
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Charles Joseph LUCARELLI, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 31, 2007.
